original_title: 500 Days: Lost Storylines of the 2001 Daytona 500
overview: As the 1999 NASCAR Winston Cup Series season draws to a close, Ray Evernham unexpectedly ends his tenure as Jeff Gordon’s crew chief. Evernham’s new ambition – bringing Dodge back to NASCAR’s top series – singlehandedly alters the trajectory of the 2000 season, which becomes a year of tremendous change.
title: 500 Days: Lost Storylines of the 2001 Daytona 500
